70010000070963.description:
Jubilee é um jogo clássico de plataformas onde terás de saltar e rodopiar para ultrapassar uma série de obstáculos. Sem melhorias nem reforços. Recolhe pedras preciosas e salva animais. Há vários percursos a seguir nas várias regiões do mundo do jogo. Encontra a saída e reencontra a liberdade!


PLATAFORMAS CLÁSSICAS
No Jubilee, não há tempo para saltos mal calculados nem faltas de concentração. Se queres vencer todos os desafios, terás de jogar da forma mais precisa possível!

UM MUNDO NÃO LINEAR
O Jubilee está repleto de percursos alternativos e passagens secretas. Só tu decidirás qual o caminho a seguir e quais as regiões a libertar!

SALVA OS ANIMAIS
O mundo está cheio de animais que têm de ser salvos. Serás capaz de encontrá-los a todos?

CONTRARRELÓGIO
Os desafios de contrarrelógio permitem personalizar a experiência completa do jogo.

OUTRO HERÓI DESBLOQUEÁVEL
A Jubilee não está sozinha neste mundo. Encontra o outro herói e experimenta um jogo completamente diferente!


Prenderam-te por não teres pago uma dívida. Mas quem é que disse que são eles que mandam aqui?!
Seja como for, nem sequer estavas a pensar pagar o que devias...
70010000070963.intro: Salta e rodopia nas plataformas do Jubilee. Sem melhorias nem reforços. Só tu, pedras preciosas para recolher e animais para salvar, rumo à liberdade!
70010000070963.name: Jubilee

70010000071873.description:
You can even control time. But will it help?
You became a lab rat in the hands of alien scientists. Will you be able to get out of the space laboratory? Pass dozens of levels with hundreds of puzzles using not only agility and logic, but also a special device that allows you to slow down, speed up and even stop time.
Your fate depends on the results of this .T.E.S.T.
70010000071873.intro: Sci-fi puzzle with portals and time management. Get out of the mysterious laboratory and find out who kidnapped you!
70010000071873.name: .T.E.S.T: Expected Behaviour

70010000074851.description:
Borzoi Adventure invites players into a whimsical world where they embody the spirited Borzoi, a graceful canine explorer embarking on an epic journey through enchanting realms brimming with treasures and challenges. With elegance and determination, players guide the Borzoi across vibrant landscapes, each teeming with elusive bones waiting to be collected.

As the Borzoi traverses diverse environments, he encounter a myriad of adversaries blocking his path. Cunning adversaries like mischievous critters and formidable foes stand between the Borzoi and his coveted prizes, adding an element of strategy and skill to each encounter.

Embark on this unforgettable journey alongside the Borzoi and uncover the riches hidden within each captivating landscape.
70010000074851.intro: Will you rise to the challenge and guide the Borzoi to victory in his grand adventure?
70010000074851.name: Borzoi Adventure

70010000075039.description:
Deadly and equally dangerous — that’s our nameless hero, who swore an oath to vanquish all the evildoers of this fantasy land! Armed with scythe and two automatic pistols, he will tolerate no one who stands in his way.

DD is a new twin-stick action with high emphasis on dynamic combat, roguelike elements and neat pixel art style. This game gives you literally hordes of enemies and different tools to dispose of them. Cartoonish violence has never been so fun before — trust us, you gonna love shooting those pesky spiders and skeletons!
70010000075039.intro: Test your super undead might wearing hood and swiping a scythe!
70010000075039.name: Deathly Dangerous

70010000075584.description:
Começa a tua carreira como golfista profissional. Participa em sessões de treino, aperfeiçoa as tuas capacidades e mostra o teu talento para te qualificares para torneios que te permitirão alcançar o sucesso.


A VERDADEIRA MECÂNICA DO GOLFE
Tipo de taco de golfe, ângulo, velocidade e direção do vento ou mesmo superfície. Estes são apenas alguns dos factores importantes a considerar quando se aproxima de uma tacada. Para além disso, terá de examinar atentamente o layout do campo de golfe. Lembre-se que será um desafio bater a bola de um bunker cheio de areia e, quando a bola cair na água, terá de a jogar da última posição conhecida.


LOCAIS VARIADOS
Visita Pristine Pines, Dusty Dunes, Grand Grove e Serene Sky. Cada um destes mapas apresenta obstáculos únicos, como escorpiões e rajadas de vento que tentarão parar ou destruir a tua bola de golfe. Para avançares nos mapas, terás de ganhar um torneio em cada um deles, ficando entre os 3 primeiros da tabela de classificação.


COMPRA NOVAS TECNOLOGIAS!
Durante a tua viagem, terás a opção de comprar equipamento adicional com moedas. A aquisição destas tecnologias permitir-te-á mover a bola de formas não convencionais, dando-te uma ligeira vantagem sobre os adversários ou mais diversão. Depois de ganhares uma quantidade suficiente de pontos de experiência, receberás pontos de habilidade que podes gastar para melhorar categorias como Precisão ou Controlo.


CARACTERÍSTICAS PRINCIPAIS:
- Mecânica avançada
- 4 locais coloridos
- Tecnologia de golfe e pontos de habilidade
- Torneios, treino e jogo livre
70010000075584.intro: Pratica, participa em torneios e torna-te o campeão de golfe!
70010000075584.name: Golfinite

70010000075812.description:
Embark on an exciting and immersive journey into the world of logistics with Forklift Simulator 2024, the ultimate simulation game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful forklift. Experience the thrill of managing a bustling warehouse, mastering the art of precision, and completing challenging tasks to become the ultimate forklift operator.
   Key Features:
Realistic Forklift Operations:
   Take control of a highly detailed and realistic forklift, complete with authentic controls and handling. Navigate through a variety of environments, from tightly packed warehouses to open loading docks, and master the intricate maneuvers required in real-life forklift operations.
Diverse Environments:
   Explore a range of meticulously designed environments, each presenting unique challenges. Whether you're moving pallets in a busy distribution center, loading cargo onto trucks, or organizing inventory in a massive storage facility, every location offers a new and exciting forklift experience.
Challenging Missions:
   Test your skills with a variety of missions and objectives. From time-based challenges to delicate cargo handling tasks, each mission will push your forklift abilities to the limit. Can you efficiently stack pallets, organize inventory, and navigate through tight spaces without causing any damage?
Upgradable Forklift:
   Unlock new models with improved speed, lifting capacity, and handling to tackle more demanding tasks as you progress through the game.
  Forklift Simulator 2024 provides an unparalleled simulation experience, offering a perfect blend of realism, challenge, and fun. Whether you're a seasoned forklift operator or a newcomer to the world of logistics, get ready to lift, stack, and maneuver your way to forklift mastery!
70010000075812.intro: Experience realistic forklift operations, diverse environments, and challenging missions.
70010000075812.name: Forklift Simulator 2024

70010000076133.description:
Choose your favorite bottle, mix all ingredients, freeze it, and squeeze out the frozen honey jelly!

You are the owner of a frozen honey truck, and people can't get enough of your tasty honey desserts! Start the cooking adventure by choosing the bottle shape, adding candies, pouring colorful honey, and mixing it up. After that, put the stencil on the bottle, pop it into the fridge, and enjoy the sounds of the frozen honey. Sweet, soft, and incredibly tasty – frozen honey jelly has never been this much fun!

Watch the ASMR rainbow jelly dance and swirl into the perfect frozen honey dessert In this game, you're the mastermind behind the sensational frozen honey jelly treats that everyone loves on social media!

Explore the joy of experimenting with various candies and colorful syrups to create your own satisfying frozen honey. It's not just a game – it's an interactive journey that combines jelly with the joy of crafting!

Features:
- create fabulous and colorful frozen honey jelly desserts!
- let your imagination run wild using different sweets, honey colors, bottle shapes, and stencils! 
- meet the demands of your customers
- enjoy the ASMR sounds while preparing your delicious frozen honey!
- perform special tasks of collector, achiever, gamer and purchaser
- serve unique VIP characters
- customize your truck using various skins, signs, and truck shapes
- use skins to change the look of your equipment
- earn money to spend in the store on skins, bottles, candies, and more!
- watch your customers eat the frozen honey jelly desserts you have prepared and wait for their reactions! 

Dive into the pleasures of crafting, innovating, and experiencing the captivating charm of the Frozen Honey ASMR game!
70010000076133.intro: Enjoy making your frozen honey jelly desserts from scratch in the most satisfying ASMR game!
70010000076133.name: Frozen Honey ASMR

70010000076561.description:
Depois de milhões de pessoas terem jogado as 3 primeiras partes de "Croc's World", agora é hora de "Croc's World 4"!
"Croc's World 4" é um jogo de plataforma clássico com muitos novos inimigos e novas reviravoltas!

Possui:
+ 60 níveis incríveis em 4 ilhas!
+ 2 novos personagens para jogar: Canguru "Roodie" e "Baby Croc"
+ 2 novos veículos: submarino e helicóptero
+ Belos gráficos!
+ 6 temas diferentes!
+ Muitos inimigos desafiadores
+ 4 chefes finais do mal
70010000076561.name: Croc's World 4

70010000076663.description:
Dive into the immersive world of Football Simulator 2024, the ultimate 3D football simulation that puts you in the heart of the action. Experience the thrill of the beautiful game as you take on the role of a rising football star, aiming to conquer different championships and etch your name in football history.

Key Features:

Championship Glory: Compete in a variety of championships, from local leagues to prestigious international tournaments. Test your skills against formidable opponents and lead your team to victory.

Realistic Gameplay: Enjoy a true-to-life football experience with stunning 3D graphics, precise player movements, and realistic ball physics. Every pass, shot, and goal feels like the real thing.

Build Your Legacy: Customize your player, choose your team, and embark on a journey to football greatness. Make strategic decisions both on and off the field to shape your career and leave a lasting legacy.

Dynamic Environments: Play in a variety of stadiums with dynamic weather conditions that affect the gameplay. 

Skill Development: Hone your skills through realistic training sessions. Improve your passing, shooting, and defensive abilities to become a well-rounded player on the virtual pitch.

Are you ready to write your name in football history? Lace up your boots and step into the world of Football Simulator 2024. The pitch is yours to conquer!
70010000076663.intro: Are you ready to write your name in football history? Lace up your boots and step into the world of Football Simulator 2024.
70010000076663.name: Football Simulator 2024

70010000076853.description:
The new powerful form allows you to walk on walls, absorb scientists to grow, morph into objects, and blend with the environment when you are outside the view of humans!

Your quest is to find and defeat Dr. Vial to regain your human form. Face fierce guards and powerful bosses who will stop at nothing to prevent you from achieving your goal! 

Explore a world filled with danger and mystery as you fight your way through each level, using your wits and strength to overcome the challenges that lie ahead!

Features:
- show your dominance using various attacks like throwing, exploding, or smashing into your enemy!
- avoid enemy vision and, when needed, morph into objects to prevent detection 
- climb on walls and attack from above!
- upgrade your armor, move speed, growth speed, and fever charge to increase your advantage over your enemies!
- beat your records on bonus levels. Push guards in the void to go as far as possible, but be careful because the ground is falling!
- challenge yourself and beat Stealth Mode levels where you must escape unnoticed! Here is a twist - you can't attack here!
- earn keys found on the levels to open prize boxes
- expand your observation base 
- put on different skins to look even more dangerous!

Will you be able to defeat Dr. Vial and become human again?
70010000076853.intro: You were turned into a dark creature by evil scientists and finally managed to break free! It's time for revenge!
70010000076853.name: The Nom

70050000047067.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Pastel pink skin
- Black and white skin
- Nuclear skin
- Lava skin
- RGB skin
- White gradient skin
- Black gradient skin
- Camo skin 
- Tartan skin
- Cactus morph 
- Globe morph
- Lantern morph
- Toilet morph
- Car morph
- Ball morph
- Speaker morph
- Guitar morph
- Popcorn morph
- Water cooler morph
- Night lamp morph
- additional 7500 cash and 500 gems

Change the look of your monster to become even scarier and unlock new morphic objects that you can turn into!
70050000047067.intro: Let your enemies tremble with fear when they see you!
70050000047067.name: The Nom: Monster Madness

70050000047068.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Eyeball ingredient
- Cockroach ingredient
- Worm ingredient
- Brain ingredient
- Poop ingredient
- Tooth ingredient
- Candy skull ingredient
- additional 1000 coins to spend in the shop

Add these ingredients to frozen honey jelly, and your VIP customers will surely be pleased!
70050000047068.intro: Mix delicious and disgusting ingredients to satisfy your most demanding customers!
70050000047068.name: Frozen Honey ASMR: Yucky Pack

70050000047071.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Hand-held freezer for your honey jelly!
- Candy cane ingredient
- Snowman ingredient
- Bear bottle 
- Duck with Santa hat skin
- additional 1500 coins to spend in the shop

Add new winter ingredients to your frozen honey jelly and freeze it using your new freezer!
70050000047071.intro: Prepare your delicious frozen honey jelly using a hand-held freezer!
70050000047071.name: Frozen Honey ASMR: Frost Pack

70050000047073.description:
With this DLC, you'll unlock: 
- Tuk Tuk truck
- Half-round signboard on top
- Plasma skin
- Graffiti skin
- Golden skin
- additional 2000 coins to spend in the shop

Unlock a new truck, change its look with awesome skins, and put a sign on top!
70050000047073.intro: Change the look of your truck to make it look special and unique!
70050000047073.name: Frozen Honey ASMR: Truck Pack

70010000067465.description:
Captain Long John Silverside and his unwilling crew have landed on the forbidden Islands of Ser-Lloyn and incurred the wrath of the heathen gods! It's every pirate for themselves in a back-stabbing, treasure-grabbing struggle, and only one may live...

Bullion: The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle is a local multiplayer brawler for up to four players, featuring a cast of backstabbing bovine buccaneers and a unique blend of PvP and co-op gameplay.

Stranded on the Islands of Ser-Lloyn, the heathen gods have declared that only the one bringing the greatest offering of treasure shall live - so each pirate must grab as much loot as they can! Even death will not deny the gods their game; fallen pirates become ghosts and can return to life at their gravestones. However... should the entire crew fall at the same time then the game ends with no winner - so players must balance working together in order to keep at least one crewmember alive with doing whatever it takes in order to have the most treasure at the end of the battle! Unlock the secrets, voyage across the islands and battle titanic champions in an attempt to defy the gods and attempt to survive the Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle!
70010000067465.intro: Pirate Cattle! Bad puns! Back-stabbing, loot-grabbing action! Plunder the most treasure and survive the curse... just don't let the whole crew wipe out!
70010000067465.name: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

70010000075932.description:
Experience the full range of incredible features on the MakOS new operating system. 
Unleash your creativity, jot down thoughts, crunch numbers, streamline your schedule, 
and explore at your leisure. All the essential tools are at your fingertips!
   Features:
• Calculator - a powerful tool designed to simplify your mathematical tasks with precision and efficiency.
• To Do - stay organized, increase productivity, and manage your tasks efficiently.
• Gallery - choose from an  collection of backgrounds to complement your style, and provides the perfect backdrop   
• Notebook - a versatile tool designed to enhance your note-taking experience and boost productivity

Empower yourself. Discover the perfect configuration and craft the extraordinary user experience you're entitled to.
70010000075932.intro: Get ready for a challenging and entertaining journey through the timeless gameplay of the beloved game.
70010000075932.name: MakOS new operating system

70070000020550.description:
Your ball drops like a brick through colorful helix platforms that block its descent, but if you hit a red spot, it's over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again. 

Even trap platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman or stop and wait for your next chance to roll and jump!

Features:
- drop your ball with crazy fast speed and make your way through helix platforms
- face your friends or family in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players with 4 different gameplay modes!
- practice your reflexes and break your best scores
- customize your ball with 36 unique skins!
- defeat bosses on levels with obstacles like switches and metal platforms that not even a fireball falling at full speed can destroy
- see how many levels you can complete in this never-ending game
- use extra 2000 coins to unlock skins even faster 
- invite anyone to play thanks to easy controls and simple rules
- never get bored thanks to this amazing time killer!
 
Even trap platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman or stop and wait for your next chance to roll and jump!

If you don't want to play solo, choose a multiplayer mode for up to 4 players and compete with your friends or family. Together, pick one of the four different gameplay modes with special challenges: get the highest score while avoiding getting minus points, be the first at the finish line, go as far as you can in a limited time or collect all the letters and form the word before other players do it! Reveal who is the fastest and most agile jumping ball among you!

The key is mastering your reflexes and looking ahead. To guide the bouncing ball, rotate the platforms to align the ball with the cracks. Do this in quick succession for a combo move and higher points. If you pass 3 levels consecutively, you'll be invincible for the first bounce after!

Jump into never-ending adventure with unlimited levels, test your skills, and invite others to have fun together!
70070000020550.intro: Blast your way through helix platforms, smash, bump and bounce to reach the end! Compete in the new multiplayer gameplay mode and collect all the letters!
70070000020550.name: Helix Jump: Catch The Letters

70070000020563.description:
Experience the strangely satisfying thrill of watching your mob multiply as you aim and shoot at the gates. Witness your army grow to massive proportions! Strategically deploy your mighty champions to break through enemy mobs and reach their bases. Choose the best combo to win!

Features: 
- fire new Knight mobs that fight with the strength of many Normie mobs thanks to a large amount of health and strength
- fire new Explodon champion with Jump & Crush primary skill and Final Boom area skill
- use new Rocket Barrage ultimate which nukes your enemies with bombs!
- open additional 12 booster packs with cards 
- spend 25000 extra coins to upgrade your cards in the armory
- fire mobs from your cannon and grow your army
- launch strong champions when your cannon is supercharged 
- play in local multiplayer mode with a friend and shoot two cannons at once!
- use multiplier gates or speed boosts strategically to gain a more significant advantage over your enemy
- destroy enemy bases and strengthen your own 
- play even against two enemies at the same time!
- unlock and level up different cannons, super champions, mobs and ultimates! 
- open booster pack to enhance your card collection

Use the special elements in the levels, such as speed boosts, multipliers, moving gates, and many more. Defend, conquer and rise to victory in this epic tower defense showdown!

If you need some help, you can invite a friend to play together in local multiplayer mode! Prepare for battle, devise a strategy together and fire your mobs from TWO cannons to triumph!

Win battles to unlock booster packs of varying rarities and enhance your card collection. Collectible cards hold the power to elevate your tower defense strategy to new heights. Unlock all the cannons, mobs and champions in the armory and discover their amazing evolutions as you level them up!

Rally your army, harness the power of collectible cards, and become the tower defense champion you were born to be!
70070000020563.intro: Are you ready to become the ultimate champion in the world of tower defense battles? Create, grow, and lead your Knight mobs along with Explodon champions!
70070000020563.name: Mob Control: Champions Edition

70070000020574.description:
Grab your golf club, check the wind direction, aim well, choose the force of impact on the ball and hit it! Hurry up because no one is going to wait for you!

This game is all about speed, precision and decision-making. Compete in tournament mode on random maps with different rules. Score as many points as possible by hitting the ball in the center of the target, be first in a race to hit the ball into the hole before others do, or find the best way to beat everyone in a mini-golf with various obstacles!

Features:
- dress your golfer as a Knight or a Magician
- try a brand new Sword bat with maximum accuracy and power!
- use the new Eye ball with maximum wind resistance in matches!
- play golf battle royale tournaments and become a champion
- play against your friends or family in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!
- practice your skills before tournaments in Zen mode 
- compete on over 15 maps with various obstacles and shortcuts 
- earn packs for winning tournaments to get skin cards, upgrade cards and money
- unlock silly character skins, golf clubs and balls in various funny shapes
- buy golf club and ball upgrades using earned coins
- perform quests to collect awesome rewards on your reward track

Consider the direction and speed of the wind when developing your strategy. After each match, the worst ones drop out so if you want to make it to the finals you have to stick to the podium! 

If you don't want to play solo, you can always invite your friends or family to play in the multiplayer mode! Choose your character skins, golf clubs and compete in a tournament for the title of the best golfer!

If you feel like practicing a little, turn on Zen Mode and become a better golfer! Choose a map, wind parameters and practice your strokes without worrying about time or other players!

Do you have what it takes to be the last one standing and become a golf champion?
70070000020574.intro: Face off against a dozen opponents in an ultimate golf battle royale, or invite friends to play in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!
70070000020574.name: Golf Guys: Fantasy Edition

70010000075577.description:
Escape to a world of wonder as you enjoy a magical twist on classic Solitaire! Simply play one card up or one card down from the top card on your draw pile to clear cleverly designed puzzle boards. As you remove cards, you'll slowly uncover hand-painted scenes of a gorgeous fantasy realm.

Play Dreamland Solitaire today to begin the journey of relaxation and fun!
70010000075577.name: Dreamland Solitaire

70010000076096.description: Step into the golden sandals of an ancient Egyptian Pharaoh, guiding your empire through the sands of time. Address the diverse concerns of your subjects, from state affairs and spiritual dilemmas to courtly intrigues and romances. Your decisions will either amass wealth, enhance the economy, and glorify the empire with grand temples and pyramids, or lead to its downfall. Engage with gods balancing their favour and wrath. Each choice weaves into the rich tapestry of your reign, with past decisions shaping future challenges. Rule wisely to avoid rebellion and maintain divine favour, ensuring your legacy endures through the ages.
70010000076096.intro: Embrace your divine rule and carve your legacy in the sands of ancient Egypt
70010000076096.name: Throne of Egypt

70010000064841.description:
In ancient times of war in the Far East, the lands of Exilia were overrun by creatures of the night and samurais. Amidst this cruel conflict, only a bloodthirsty cursed knight can bring hope and vanquish the darkness.

Key features

Levels

Explore 8 levels of classic linear design, each featuring challenging obstacles and enemies to overcome. At the end of each level, you'll face off against a powerful boss that will put your skills to the test. And as Gabriel, you'll receive an extra skill after defeating each boss, allowing you to progress even further and take on greater challenges.

Gameplay Variety

Experience a range of mechanics, from throwing weapons to melee combat, down stabs, jumping, and dashing. Unlock the powers of Gabriel's curse to enhance your abilities. Play as both Gabriel and Lyria, each offering a unique and distinct gameplay experience for endless replayability.

Plus, once you've beaten the game with Gabriel, unlock two additional game modes: Speedrunner mode and Boss Rush mode. And the best part? You can play both of these modes with either Gabriel or Lyria for even more variety and fun!

Retro-aesthetic and sound design

Relive the glory days of classic gaming with retro-inspired 16-bit physics and perfectly polished controls. The game's stunning handcrafted 8-bit pixel art and fast anime-style animations, the 8-bit SFX and OST, enriched with sounds from the Megadrive sound chip, complete the immersive retro experience.
70010000064841.intro: Embark on a quest for revenge in Lords of Exile.
70010000064841.name: Lords of Exile

70010000067172.description:
precisa de contexto? 

P: Então... realmente acabou...?
R: Tinha que... caso contrário, Mayo passaria da validade e estragaria.
70010000067172.intro: Groovy e emocional, o clímax da maionese e o fim de uma trilogia!
70010000067172.name: My Name is Mayo 3

70010000068311.description:
Joga as  Três aventuras Originais de Tomb Raider: Pela primeira vez na história, joga a experiência completa com todas as expansões e níveis  ocultos em plataformas modernas, nesta coleção definitiva.

Jogos incluídos:
Tomb Raider I + Unfinished Business
Tomb Raider II + Golden Mask
Tomb Raider III + The Lost Artifact

Resolve  Mistérios  Ancestrais: Descobre tesouros do mundo antigo resolvendo puzzles e desvendando mistérios perdidos  na devastação do tempo.

Uma Aventura à volta do mundo: Segue  Lara Croft pelo mundo fora e enfrenta  adversários mortais e mitos perigosos.


Restauradas com fidelidade: Experimenta os clássicos e desfruta  de gráficos melhorados, com a opção de mudar para o  visual original em polígonos, sempre que quiseres.
70010000068311.intro: Descobre as  Aventuras Originais  de Lara Croft,  Restauradas com Fidelidade
70010000068311.name: Tomb Raider I-III Remastered

70010000070181.description:
Depois de dez anos de paz... o malvado Daimur voltou! A Princesa Arzette é a única esperança do Reino de Faramore para restaurar a harmonia na terra!

Neste novo jogo interativo de ação e aventura, você controla a engenhosa princesa Arzette. Viaje por vários locais de tirar o fôlego cheios de escória, vilania e segredos, fale com os habitantes locais para descobrir mistérios e objetivos e enfrente o malvado Daimur como Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore traz para você a melhor experiência de jogo interativo desde a invenção do CD- ROM!

Apresentando:

• Fundos pintados à mão e incríveis artes de sprites.
• Cinemática de desenho animado totalmente dublada com um elenco colorido de personagens.
• Um mundo vasto com diversos locais e muitos segredos.
• Adquira itens e habilidades poderosas explorando e ajudando os necessitados.
• Equipe de desenvolvimento veterana incluindo o artista Rob Dunlavey, John Linneman e Audi Sorlie do Digital Foundry, os dubladores Jeffrey Rath e Bonnie Jean Wilbur e o premiado compositor Jake "Button Masher" Silverman.
70010000070181.name: Arzette: The Jewel of Faramore

70010000063646.description:
Up to four players build and run a restaurant from scratch, choosing dishes, buying and placing appliances – some of which can be daisy-chained together to create ambitious automatic kitchens – cooking food and serving customers. 

Players have free rein to design their restaurant which will expand and develop between shifts – with additional content and challenges unlocked through progression. 

Can you cook, serve and manage your way through 15 hectic days in your restaurant and unlock a brand-new franchise?

- Classic co-op cooking action, with a wide selection of mains, sides, sauces, toppings, desserts, and starters.
- Choose your equipment, lay out your kitchen, curate your menu and plate up your dishes.
- From bubbling soups to sublime salads, tender steaks to hearty pies, there's something for everyone.

- Look after front-of-house: seating customers, delivering orders, and managing patience.
- Equip your restaurant to handle the most fickle of customers and deliver them what they need, right when they need it.
- Co-operate with your team like a well-olive-oiled machine or build a name for yourself going it alone. 
- Exceed your goals and take your franchise to greater heights at a new location, bringing with you new unlocks and upgrade

- Upgrade and rearrange your restaurant to your personal taste: when the restaurant closes for the day, the planning begins!
- Decide what new equipment to purchase, and place it wherever you want.
- Want to go high-tech? Install the turbo-ovens, crank up the conveyors, and make way for the robo-kitchen of the future.
- Fancy something a little more... fancy? Curate your art collection, fix up that wallpaper, enlist a friend as a maître d' and get ready to provide the culinary experience of a lifetime.

- Exceed your goals and start over at your next location, bringing with you new unlocks and upgrades.
- Tailor your brand towards gourmet dining, or fine-tune your fast food franchise.
- Every restaurant is procedurally-generated with its own climate, customers and conditions.
- Return to your franchise HQ to view your achievements, customise your characters and upgrade your kit, ready for your next adventure!
70010000063646.intro: PlateUp! combines chaotic kitchen and restaurant management with strategic planning and development to create a delightful roguelite dish unlike any other.
70010000063646.name: PlateUp!

70010000068316.description:
O mais recente lançamento da série Spirit Hunter.
Spirit Hunter: Death Mark II é um jogo de suspense-horror passado numa prestigiada academia.

Quando os rumores se espalham sobre ocorrências sobrenaturais na famosa Konoehara Academy em H City, Tóquio, cabe ao chefe da família Kujou, também conhecido como “Spirit Doctor”, assumir o caso.

Repara que anunciam a morte das pessoas, e estudantes que não são o que parecem. Através da tua investigação, parece que um espírito chamado “The Departed” é o cérebro por trás de tudo isto, e parece que ele quer alguma coisa contigo...

Esta entrada apresenta uma nova função de deslizamento lateral quando se viaja para locais diferentes. Combinada com a perspetiva na primeira pessoa durante as investigações, a experiência Spirit Hunter está mais imersiva do que nunca.

O sistema de parceria também foi melhorado. A taxa de sucesso das tuas ações durante “Atos de Suspensão” muda dependendo do teu parceiro escolhido, aumentando ainda mais os elementos de suspense deste lançamento.
70010000068316.name: Spirit Hunter: Death Mark II

70010000068806.description:
Novo jogo musical de ritmo com as estrelas da série Azure Striker Gunvolt, Lumen, Lola e Luxia cantando 15 músicas diferentes.

Siga as notas no ritmo da batida e chegue às maiores pontuações neste jogo de ritmo eletrizante!

Os controles analógicos duplos sincronizam com os personagens dançando nos cenários 3D para criar uma experiência totalmente imersiva.

■CARACTERÍSTICA 1: uma nova experiência rítmica onde você está em sincronia com as musas!

As notas fluem no alto da tela em vários tipos: aperte os botões para tocar e segurar as notas, e movimente o direcional com "Direcionar notas" e "Deslizar notas".

Quando você movimenta em 8 direções diferentes e desliza em arcos nos direcionais analógicos, seus movimentos são sincronizados com as divas dançando no fundo – como se você estivesse dançando junto com elas.

■CARACTERÍSTICA 2: inclui um reprodutor de som com vocais completos das musas!

Todas as 15 faixas incluídas e futuros DLC planejados são selecionados da biblioteca vasta de faixas vocais aclamadas da série Gunvolt, incluindo faixas usadas nos 5 jogos da série, lançamentos somente em CD e recurso de animação Gunvolt. Ouça qualquer música incluída no jogo gratuitamente no reprodutor de música do jogo.

Use as funções de repetição e lista de reprodução incluídas para criar a própria mixagem de músicas!

■CARACTERÍSTICA 3: as musas são charmosas e elegantes!

As musas, Lumen e Lola, ao lado de Djinn e Luxia, dançam com movimentos encantadores e dão a voz a uma experiência completa.

Se erros repetidos fizerem com que você falhe em uma música, as habilidades de Hino delas recuperarão a partida, permitindo que jogadores de qualquer nível de habilidade aproveitem o jogo rítmico sem preocupações.

Elenco
Musa, Lumen: Megu Sakuragawa
Musa, Lola: Mayu Mineda
Djinn, Luxia: Rico Sasaki

■CARACTERÍSTICA 4: apresentando cenas de toda a série para uma jornada musical nostálgica!

Além dos videoclipes das cantoras, é possível reproduzir músicas com cenas de jogo e cenas da série Azure Striker Gunvolt.

Músicas diferentes apresentarão vários vídeos de jogabilidade, dando aos fãs da série uma visão nostálgica de experiências passadas e, aos novos fãs, uma visão dos jogos onde as cantoras encantadoras fizeram sua estreia.
70010000068806.intro:
As músicas lendárias levarão você para o futuro.
Anunciamos um novo jogo de ritmo da série Azure Striker Gunvolt!
70010000068806.name: GUNVOLT RECORDS: Cychronicle

70010000071404.description: Birth é um jogo de "apontar e clicar" sobre a vida solitária em uma cidade grande. Para amenizar a solidão, você decide construir uma companhia a partir de ossos e órgãos encontrados enquanto explora a cidade.
70010000071404.intro:
A solidão toma conta do seu ser.
Você vai construir uma criatura, uma companhia, um coração quente e úmido, uma coleção de ossos.
70010000071404.name: Birth

70010000071867.description:
A shooting game aimed at restoring peace to Akiba by controlling gun-slinging maids and defeating zombies.

■Use the right skills and destroy the zombies that come for you from behind the screen!
By defeating swarms of zombies and levelling up, you can gain a skill at random. These include being able to fire missiles, controlling flying drones and much more! Chose the skills that suit your play style the best to destroy those zombies!


■You're not alone!Defeat the zombies along with any stray maids you meet!
If you shoot a "Unity bullet" into a maid undergoing zombification, they'll fight alongside you!
The more allies you gain in battle, the stronger your stray maids will become!

■Train your maids so that they won't lose to any zombies!
By using the points you receive in battle, you can purchase items like "Unity Bullets", which are used to recruit new maids. Other items to help power-up maids, along with various accessories that can help you in battle, are available as well. Make the ultimate maid that can take down any zombie by buffing them up with items!


<Character>
・Nagisa Hihara      (Voice : Karin Isobe）
・Rinka Kazane    (Voice : Lynn）
・Arisa Hikami    (Voice : Yuuki Takada ）
・Leyla Sanders   (Voice : Kanna Nakamura）
・Otoha Tsuchiura (Voice : Honoka Kuroki）

・Kanon Mikagami  (Voice : Anzu Haruno）
・Miona Anjo      (Voice : Yamaki Anna）

<Staff>
・Character Design:Waon Inui
・Scenario:Linkedbrain Inc.
・Producer:Yujiro Usuda
70010000071867.intro:
Zombies left, right and center!!
Will the maids be able to bring peace back to Akiba?!
70010000071867.name: Maid of the Dead

70010000073043.description:
BANCHOU TACTICS is a strategy turn based role-playing 

For several years of conflicts, there were bloody struggles between three high schools around this area (somewhere in Japan).  This madness played by the three schools: Sakae High School, Nakamura Technical High School and Minato High School.  They engaged in many fierce battles with the aim to show who’s boss in this town. 

When Kitagawa Seiichi, the demon king of Minato High School just graduated last year, all the balance of three power came to doubt once again.

The game is set in Minato High School The story focuses on TAIGA ARASHI.
70010000073043.intro: Japanese Gangster High School Tactics RPG!
70010000073043.name: BANCHOU TACTICS

70010000073577.description:
Combate como uma bruxa bonita e sexy enquanto deixas cair blocos ao ritmo para limpares as filas do teu lado do puzzle.

Envia blocos para o lado do teu adversário para o despistar e rasgar as suas roupas!
Cada fase contém um novo tipo de ritmo cativante e um novo elemento de puzzle para um desafio cada vez maior!

[História]
Num mundo onde a magia se desenvolveu em vez da tecnologia, dez adoráveis bruxas vivem juntas numa grande torre para estudar e desenvolver os seus conhecimentos místicos.
No entanto, surgem problemas quando uma força misteriosa assume o controlo dos seus corpos e as obriga a tentar despir-se umas às outras! 
Pensando inicialmente que se tratava de uma partida, estas travessuras despertam a atenção de um convidado inesperado, 
e depressa se torna claro que há forças muito mais poderosas em ação.

Conseguirão estas bruxas aprender a cooperar para salvar a sua torre e os seus guarda-roupas da destruição total?

[Personagens]
Ibis, a autoproclamada Bruxa Natural.
Entail, o Guerreiro Mágico Rabugento
Tariff, o residente da Terra da Cauda das Fadas
Droff, o médico bruxo de outra terra
Forge, a sedutora impiedosa
Virgule, o Guardião da Torre
Yew, a Suave Mulher de Vestido Cruzado
Sleek, o astrólogo de outra terra
Minnow, o único utilizador de óculos
Boggart, o Grande e Poderoso

[Características]
- 15 fases diferentes de dificuldade variável + fases de bónus escondidas.
- Clique na ferramenta de calibração de tempo no menu de configurações para garantir uma entrada confortável em qualquer configuração.
- Modo de sobrevivência ininterrupto para testar as tuas capacidades e resistência numa fase após outra.
- Modo de camarim para veres a arte detalhada e colorida das personagens, leres as biografias e até alternares entre camadas de roupa para te divertires à grande!
70010000073577.intro: É um jogo de puzzle e um jogo de ritmo combinados numa divertida brincadeira!
70010000073577.name: Witch's Rhythm Puzzle

70010000073759.description:
Embarque em uma jornada com Light, um habitante da Vila de Selka, que, após ingressar na cobiçada Holos Over military, jura proteger sua vila. No entanto, durante uma missão, a vila cai nas garras de um agressor desconhecido, deixando-a em ruínas. Desesperado, Light ouve o chamado de uma besta guardiã. Para ganhar força, Light segue as palavras da besta guardiã e cumpre um contrato místico.

Forje conexões profundas com seus camaradas e bestas guardiãs. Quanto mais forte o vínculo, mais as bestas guardiãs liberam seu poder, aprimorando a colaboração com os aliados. A força desses laços pode até influenciar o curso dos eventos do jogo.

Descubra materiais espalhados pelo campo para forjar e fortalecer. Reforce suas armas e armaduras usando esses materiais. Adquira livros de forja por meio de missões ou tarefas de guilda, desbloqueando novas variações para aprimoramentos. Ocasionalmente, esse processo pode gerar armas poderosas, adicionando uma camada estratégica ao seu arsenal.

Mergulhe em um mundo envolvente onde os laços moldam o destino e as melhorias estratégicas forjam um caminho para a vitória. Você atenderá ao chamado das bestas guardiãs e restaurará o destino de Light? Junte-se à aventura agora!
70010000073759.intro: Forje laços e lute com bestas guardiãs neste RPG de fantasia!
70010000073759.name: Genso Chronicles

70010000074276.description:
A série Pretty Girls está de regresso com uma abordagem alargada a um clássico!

Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire PLUS oferece-te as mesmas regras do solitário que já conheces, mas desta vez, vais encontrar 11 adversárias! Desfruta ainda mais das opções de jogabilidade e personaliza a tua experiência a fundo. Escolhe entre vários tipos de dificuldade, joga o tutorial para aprender ou para refrescar o teu conhecimento do jogo, usa dicas ou ajudas, muda o número de vezes que sacas do baralho e muito mais!

Cria os teus próprios dioramas a partir das personagens, roupas e fundos recebidos! Há imensos motivos para jogares vezes sem conta! Passa o teu tempo junto destas adoráveis senhoras, todas elas com vozes em japonês.

Características:

• Desfruta do solitário clássico, com regras de klondike. Não vais querer parar de jogar!
• Encadeia rapidamente os teus movimentos com cartas parar criar combinações e aumentar a pontuação.
• Conhece um elenco de 11 companheiras, todas com vozes em japonês!
• Escolhe entre vários tipos de dificuldade e usa ajudas quando estiveres em apuros.
• Desbloqueia novos fatos para usar no Vestiário e montar dioramas personalizados!
70010000074276.intro: Mostra a agilidade do teu pensamento enquanto jogas uma partida de solitário junto de um elenco de adoráveis companheiras!
70010000074276.name: Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire PLUS

70010000075063.description: A time-limited survival game infused with rogue-lite elements and an adorable art style! The world has plunged into darkness, and you are its sole beacon of hope. Will you endure until dawn, or succumb to repeated deaths in your quest? Fear not, for you can collect coins and more during your journey to arm yourself!
70010000075063.intro: Wield 5+ powerful Super Weapons all together! Face 300 enemies at the same time! Will you survive?
70010000075063.name: Twilight Survivors

70010000075599.description:
This is an action RPG released by Nihon Falcom in 1987. 

Players take on the role of Adol Christin, a red-haired adventurer, as he embarks on a journey to seek the six Books of Ys.

At the time of its release, the PC gaming industry was saturated with challenging RPGs. However, Nihon Falcom took a different approach with this game, releasing it with the concept of ""Now, it's the era to bring kindness in RPGs,"" aiming to create an RPG that everyone could enjoy.

The game features clever level-up settings that eliminate the hassle of grinding for experience points, the removal of unreasonable traps, and agile characters that move smoothly. With numerous thoughtful design choices, the game can be enjoyed comfortably, and it is not an exaggeration to say that it is filled with ""kindness,"" as the tagline suggests.

*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and ""How to play"" screens are in English.
70010000075599.intro: The landmark first game of an ongoing popular title. Master the 'half-character shift' and embark on an adventure in the land of Esteria!
70010000075599.name: EGGCONSOLE Ys PC-8801mkIISR

70010000075881.description:
Apresentando um jogo de festa totalmente novo para todos pegarem, jogarem e se divertirem!
Compartilhe o Joy-Con™ para até 6 jogadores se juntarem à festa!

Controles simplificados, aprimorados e intuitivos tornam cada sessão de jogo ilimitada e divertida facilmente!
Compete com amigos e família e deixe os bons tempos rolarem!

[Modo Livre]
Escolha seu jogo favorito e jogue imediatamente!
Aproveite uma seleção adicional de jogos cooperativos onde vocês devem trabalhar juntos para ter sucesso!

[Modo Festa]
Escolha jogos para jogar em sequência e compita para ser o Campeão da Festa!

[Modo Online]
Divirta-se jogando juntos online, independentemente da distância!
Jogue jogos em tempo real com amigos, mesmo que estejam longe!

[Edição de Personagem]
Crie seus próprios personagens e convide-os para a festa para jogar junto!

[Controles de Movimento]
Balance, gire e incline o Joy-Con para desfrutar de uma experiência de jogo dinâmica!
70010000075881.intro:
É hora da Festa Festa de novo!
Todos participem e vamos Festejar!
70010000075881.name: Party Party Time 2

70010000076466.description:
Ooga é um homem das cavernas barbudo e camarada, vivendo sua vida tranquilamente durante a Idade da Pedra. Até que certo dia, seu querido avô, Booga, é sequestrado por uma gangue de bandidos.

Nosso herói deve derrotar os homens das cavernas bandidos e libertar seu querido avô. Pule, escape de armadilhas e suba escadas. Detone dinossauros com pulos e consiga armas de projéteis primitivos. Enfrente desafiadores chefes bandidos. Colete moedas para usar na loja e subir de nível.

A nostalgia encantadora de Caveman Ransom é o suficiente para te levar de volta para uma era dos jogos perdida há muito tempo. 


Destaques:
* Plataforma no estilo 16 bits
* 50 fases
* 5 chefes
* Diversas armas e itens
70010000076466.intro: Ação de plataforma e pulos clássicos com tema da Idade da Pedra
70010000076466.name: Caveman Ransom

70010000077364.description:
Bem-vindo ao "Top Web Search 23" - O derradeiro confronto de pesquisa!

Embarca numa missão épica para conquistar a Web enquanto enfrentas pares de opções intrigantes. As regras são simples: adivinha qual a opção que recebe mais pesquisas na Web e ganha +1 ponto por cada escolha correcta. Mas tem cuidado - uma decisão errada leva-te de volta à estaca zero.

Explore mais de 500 cenários de pesquisa cativantes!

Mergulha na fronteira digital com mais de 500 cenários de pesquisa cativantes. Vai optar pelo icónico London Eye ou pela preocupação global das alterações climáticas? Que tal escolher entre Tóquio e Oslo?

Embarque numa viagem fascinante através de um vasto espetro de categorias, incluindo marcas de renome, empresas influentes, música, actores, AGD, RTV e consultas quotidianas como "lojas perto de mim" ou "restaurante italiano". Explora diversas paisagens, encontrando figuras históricas, países e muito mais. Cada decisão que tomas revela uma aventura única no mundo expansivo e diversificado de "Top Web Search 23".
70010000077364.name: TOP Web Search 23

70010000077376.description:
Tem um monte de gatos aqui. Tipo, um monte!
E eles juntaram muitas bolas de lã em suas aventuras.

Adivinha quem vai ter que desemaranhar isso tudo?

Pois é… Mas não podemos ficar bravos com os bichanos por serem bichanos, especialmente quando desemaranhar lã é uma atividade tão relaxante!

Características do jogo:
- Diversos quebra-cabeças para resolver;
- Um monte de gatinhos para te fazer companhia;
- Muitas fases com um estilo de arte adorável.
70010000077376.intro: Um quebra-cabeças encantador baseado em hexágonos repleto de gatinhos adoráveis, música e visuais aconchegantes e muita lã para desemaranhar!
70010000077376.name: Hex Cats

70010000077573.description:
This is a brain-training picture-search game to find the item of the subject hidden in the illustration.

Easy to play
・Memorize the subject item well
・Find the item hidden in the illustration
・When you found out where it is, touch the spot

It's easy to enjoy, so it's a great way to spend your free time!
If you are not sure where the answer is, just follow the hints.

・A fried egg in a child's room?
・A mushroom and chopsticks in a girls' manga frame?
・Where is the love letter in the spaceship?

.. and more!
It's up to you to find the secret items hidden in the pretty illustrations!
70010000077573.intro: Find the secret items hidden in the pretty illustrations!
70010000077573.name: Tiny Treasure Hunt

70050000043316.description: Esperam-te ainda mais emoções no HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Made in Italy Expansion Pack!
70050000043316.name: HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Made in Italy Expansion Pack

70010000071221.description:
Parece que não pode haver profissão mais entediante no mundo do que um avaliador em uma casa de penhores. Mas um encontro com uma misteriosa jovem dama leva um avaliador por uma série de eventos estranhos, mudando a perspectiva inicial de Dan sobre sua profissão. Neste jogo, mergulhe em uma história intrincada, onde sonhos e realidade estão entrelaçados em um único todo. Onde, em algum momento, a própria realidade pode perder sua estabilidade.

Características do jogo:
- Progressão não linear e reviravoltas inesperadas na trama
- Estilo visual único
- Música escrita especificamente para este jogo, permite que você transmita totalmente a atmosfera

"Edge of Reality" é uma Novela Visual interativa. O final dependerá de suas escolhas.
70010000071221.intro: A vida de Dan nunca mais será a mesma após conhecer esta misteriosa jovem dama.
70010000071221.name: Edge of Reality

70010000072192.description: A chama da rivalidade que incendiou a Game Boy Advance volta a acender-se em Mario vs Donkey Kong, agora com gráficos totalmente novos. Resolve todo o tipo de quebra-cabeças e coloca à prova os teus dotes para as plataformas numa tentativa para recuperar os Mini-Marios roubados.
70010000072192.name: Mario vs. Donkey Kong

70010000074820.description:
Duck, Quack, Shoot! Is a fun party game styled like an old-fashioned mechanical carnival shooting gallery. Can you beat the ducks? 

•	Single and local multiplayer game modes
•	4 unique background themes -fairground, casino, farm and outer space
•	Classic mechanical shooting gallery 
•	Fun and fast paced with a variety of traditional and special targets!
70010000074820.name: Duck Quack Shoot!

70010000074998.description:
Imagine uma caixa de cartão. Tem a forma de um ou dois felinos fofos? E cinco? E vinte?

Fit My Cat apresenta-lhe muitos gatinhos fofos que querem sentar-se onde lhes apetece. Dito isto, estamos a ficar sem espaço e estamos seriamente à procura de um organizador para gatos. Se pudesse dispensar um momento ou dois para o fazer, ficaríamos muito gratos.

Cada um deles é treinado e está bem equipado para gerir o espaço - pegue neles e faça-os rodar como achar melhor.

Só para que saibas, algumas caixas podem vir com novelos de lã ou casas de gato inteiras - mas isso não impedirá que os gatinhos corajosos tentem entrar.

Testa as tuas capacidades e mostra ao mundo que a diversão começa quando se juntam os gatos!

CARACTERÍSTICAS PRINCIPAIS
- Mais de 90 níveis de caixas de papelão, prontas para serem preenchidas com pelúcia
- Toneladas de gatos perfeitos de várias formas, cores e tamanhos
- Banda sonora meowtastic
70010000074998.intro: Organizador perfeito para gatos - serve para todos
70010000074998.name: Fit My Cat

70010000075687.description:
Prepare for a pulse-pounding odyssey into fear with "Scream and Steel - Horror Story Shooter." Your journey begins as you wake up in the inky blackness of a foreboding basement, surrounded by locked doors shrouded in mystery.     As your senses adjust to the oppressive lack of light, you'll discover that every door is sealed with ominous locks. To break free, you must rely on your instincts and wits to uncover intuitive passwords scattered throughout the eerie environment. The tension heightens with every step, creating an atmosphere that keeps you on the edge of your seat.
    The atmosphere thickens with suspense, heightened by the distant echoes of other trapped souls and the ominous presence of the pig-masked enemy. The thin line between reality and nightmare blurs as you navigate the darkness, unsure of what awaits around each corner.     Amidst the shadows, a glimmer of hope emerges in the form of a flashlight and a gun. These essential tools become your lifeline, granting you the power to illuminate the obscurity and confront the lurking menace. The flashlight pierces through the darkness, revealing hidden secrets and guiding your path, while the gun offers a desperate means of defense against the relentless adversary.
    The game's first-person perspective intensifies the horror, plunging you into the psychological torment of your character. Meticulously crafted visuals and spine-chilling audio details immerse you in a world where every creak and echo amplifies the visceral experience. 
    This is not just a game; it's a heart-pounding journey through fear, where survival hinges on wit and courage. Will you conquer the labyrinth's nightmares, or become another victim of the relentless adversary?
70010000075687.intro: Conquer the abyss, defy darkness, and confront your worst nightmares in this pulse-pounding horror odyssey.
70010000075687.name: SCREAM AND STEEL - Horror Story Shooter

70010000076487.description: Dive into the intricate world of medieval politics - as the king, your decisions shape the kingdom's fate, balancing money, health, justice, agriculture, and army. Face dilemmas ranging from court intrigue, wars, and peasant uprisings to religious conflicts and diplomatic negotiations. Each choice impacts the kingdom's wellbeing, leading to prosperity or downfall. Navigate this ever-evolving narrative, where your rule's longevity depends on your wisdom and strategy. Will you be a revered monarch or meet a traitor's end?
70010000076487.intro: Rule a kingdom where every decision can build an empire or seal your fate.
70010000076487.name: Your Majesty

70010000077417.description:
Embark on a serene and enchanting adventure with “Art of Glide”, a relaxing but captivating game that invites you to soar through an infinite number of idyllic forest environments as a paper plane.

As you navigate the infinite expanse of this procedurally generated forest, marvel at the ever-changing scenery that unfolds before your eyes whilst experiencing a sense of calm and tranquility. The gameplay is designed to be effortlessly intuitive, allowing players of all ages to enjoy the experience
70010000077417.name: Art of Glide

70010000077928.description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey of maritime entrepreneurship as you take the helm of your very own bustling seaport. In this immersive 3D tycoon game, the fate of your port lies in your hands. Are you ready to transform it into a thriving maritime empire?

Key Features:

Build and Upgrade: Construct and customize your port from the ground up. Upgrade essential facilities such as docks, warehouses, and shipping yards to enhance efficiency and increase profits.

Manage Resources: Strategically manage a variety of resources, from cargo containers to specialized goods. Keep a keen eye on supply and demand dynamics to make informed decisions that will propel your port to new heights.

Expand Your Fleet: Acquire and upgrade a diverse fleet of ships, ranging from cargo vessels to luxurious cruise liners. Each ship serves a unique purpose, contributing to the growth and reputation of your port.

Economic Mastery: Fine-tune your business strategy to maximize profits. Invest in cutting-edge technology, research new trade routes, and adapt to market trends to stay ahead of the competition.

Challenging Missions: Take on a variety of challenging missions and quests to earn rewards and unlock new opportunities. Navigate through unexpected challenges, from natural disasters to diplomatic hurdles.

Are you ready to chart the course to maritime greatness? Dive into Sea Port Tycoon 2024 and set sail on a voyage of prosperity and success!
70010000077928.intro: Are you ready to chart the course to maritime greatness?
70010000077928.name: Sea Port Tycoon 2024

70010000078191.description:
Embark on a heart-pounding 3D shooting adventure in "Z War Apocalypse Shooter" where the fate of the world rests on your shoulders. A relentless wave of zombies has engulfed the city, and as the last line of defense, it's up to you to stand against the undead horde.

Immerse yourself in a gripping zombie apocalypse, where survival is not just a choice – it's a necessity. The game challenges you to navigate through treacherous environments infested with various types of zombies. Slow-moving hordes test your accuracy, while sprinting runners demand lightning-fast reflexes. Get ready for intense encounters with scratchers, who strike with deadly precision, and confront heavy zombies that require strategic thinking to bring down.

As you progress through each level, the stakes rise, and so does the arsenal at your disposal. Earn money for every successfully completed mission and use it to unlock a variety of powerful guns, each uniquely suited for different zombie threats. From rapid-fire assault rifles to devastating shotguns, choose your weapons wisely to survive the onslaught.

"Z War Apocalypse Shooter" offers a dynamic and immersive gaming experience, combining the thrill of intense zombie battles with strategic decision-making. Can you adapt to the ever-evolving threat and become the ultimate defender against the zombie apocalypse? The fate of humanity rests on your ability to shoot, survive, and save the world. Get ready to face the undead – the fight for survival begins now!
70010000078191.intro: Get ready to face the undead – the fight for survival begins now!
70010000078191.name: Z War Apocalypse Shooter

70010000075275.description:
Embark on a futuristic journey in Cyber Taxi Simulator! As a skilled taxi driver, race against time to fulfill orders, earning coins to unlock a world of customization. Upgrade your standard taxi or indulge in a sleek new ride, each with unique enhancements. Earn coins to buy additional cars or customize your current one, creating the ultimate cyberpunk taxi fleet. 
   Key features:
• Taxi Driver Adventure: Take on the role of a taxi driver navigating the city's labyrinthine roads. Meet unique passengers, each with their own destinations.• Race Against Time: Feel the adrenaline rush as you race against the clock to fulfill orders promptly. Every second counts in this high-speed cyberpunk metropolis.
• Coin Collection: Earn coins for each successful fare. Use your hard-earned currency to upgrade your current taxi's performance or splurge on an entirely new and stylish vehicle.
• Customization Galore: Personalize your taxi with a myriad of customization options. Make your ride a reflection of your style and prowess.
70010000075275.intro: Can you earn enough coins to transform your taxi into the envy of the futuristic streets?
70010000075275.name: Cyber Taxi Simulator

70010000070325.description: Immerse yourself in high-speed excitement with " Drift Master Simulator 2024 - Driving Sim," our adrenaline-pumping driving game. Choose from a diverse selection of vehicles, customize your ride with spoilers, rims, and more to reflect your style.      Dive into action with five game modes, each offering unique challenges. Whether it's precision time trials, high-speed races, or thrilling drifts, caters to all driving enthusiasts.      Master the art of drifting and conquer dynamic environments. Get ready for a heart-pounding racing adventure – are you prepared to become the ultimate driving maestro? The road awaits in " Drift Master Simulator 2024 - Driving Sim."
70010000070325.intro: Where Precision Meets Velocity, Customize Your Ride, Conquer the Roads, and Become the Ultimate Driving Maestro!
70010000070325.name: Drift Master Simulator 2024 - Driving Sim

70010000063535.description:
Controla uma bola de Pong que tenta libertar-se da sua vida presa entre duas pás. Explora um mundo perigoso e minimalista, armado com controlos simples de dois botões: toca num botão para mudares de direção na diagonal em 45 graus e mantém premido um botão para soltares uma catártica corrida para a frente. É tudo o que precisas para resolver puzzles ambientais e níveis labirínticos. Em cada esquina há um novo desafio que irá testar as tuas capacidades de resolução de problemas com dois botões. Uma variedade de inimigos e bosses difíceis ajudam-te a marcar o teu tempo enquanto navegas por 30 níveis espalhados por quatro mundos.

Um quebra-cabeças cerebral está no coração desta versão indie de Pong.

Características principais:

Puzzles cerebrais: Os controlos simples, com dois botões, escondem uma jogabilidade complexa e cativante. Usa os teus reflexos e pensa no futuro para evitar perigos, acionar interruptores e saltar através de 30 níveis complicados. Coleccionáveis escondidos levam-te a explorar cada centímetro dos mapas minimalistas.
Uma surpresa a cada esquina: o qomp2 está sempre a surpreender-te com a introdução de novas funcionalidades, mecânicas, inimigos, armadilhas e perigos à medida que avanças no jogo. Não fiques complacente: Assim que dominares um aspeto do jogo, outro estará pronto para te desafiar.

Chefes: Quatro bosses desafiantes bloqueiam o teu caminho no final de cada mundo. Terás de usar todas as tuas novas capacidades para dominar os seus ataques e defesas. Não te preocupes. A morte não é o fim num mundo de inspiração arcade.  O reaparecimento rápido garante que estás de volta à ação em segundos.

Uma paisagem sonora serena: Uma banda sonora de música ambiente ajuda-te a entrar no ritmo e a manter a calma, enquanto percorres o labirinto minimalista.

Uma viagem emocional: Uma história enigmática de dúvida, medo e auto-aceitação, contada sem palavras através de efeitos e jogabilidade simples.
70010000063535.name: qomp2

70010000058415.description:
RPG MODERNO TÁTICO, INSPIRADO NOS CLÁSSICOS
Um novo sistema de combate determinístico, com regras fáceis de entender e profundidade surpreendente.Sem chances de falha aleatórias. Sem faixas de dano.

Manipule os elementos para tirar vantagem do campo de batalha, mas cuidado com as consequências, pois a natureza é complexa e instável. Abra abismos, eleve montanhas, ferva lagos, drene rios. Comece incêndios você depois se arrepender.

VASTA EXPLORAÇÃO DE MUNDO ABERTO
Desenterre ruínas antigas, descubra artefatos estranhos e faça novos amigos em um mundo exuberante e pitoresco. Explore os confins do arquipélago de barco. Suba aos céus como um pássaro para observar a paisagem e planejar o melhor caminho a seguir.

Por uma geração, a terrível Névoa - um espírito vasto, sem voz e cruel - vem devorando as outrora densas florestas do continente. Agora, sem nenhum lugar para chamar de lar, e com a magia concedida pelos espíritos amigáveis do arquipélago, um pequeno grupo de aspirantes a aventureiros parte. Encontre uma maneira de salvar as muitas cidades goblins da costa rochosa, descubra a verdade sobre a Névoa e, se possível, acabe com ela.
70010000058415.intro: Um grupo de goblins, com magia concedida por um espírito ancestral, vagueia pelo arquipélago, lutando contra a terrível Névoa.
70010000058415.name: Tenderfoot Tactics

70010000069074.description:
From Lazy Bear, the studio that brought you Graveyard Keeper, comes Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story™. Jump into this delightful crafting RPG set in the magical world of Bandle City, home of the furry and fun-loving yordles.

You are a shy yordle living in Yarnville, a cozy but isolated island obsessed with all things knitting. When your 101-year-long apprenticeship ends, you want nothing more than to see what lies beyond the portals that connect the rest of Bandle City. But when a party you attend goes horribly wrong, the portals collapse and everything is thrown into chaos!

With your unique knitting magic and unflappable spirit, enlist the help of new friends, restore the portals, and reunite Bandle City once more!

BEYOND THE BANDLEWOODS
In Bandle Tale, experience a never-before-seen look at life beyond the bandlewoods. Encounter curious critters, gather materials to make impossible crafts, and awaken magical portals as you move between five unforgettable new islands.

PARTY ON, BANDLE CITY!
A good life in Bandle City hinges on one thing: beet soup! Wait, no, having fun! Throw festivals to ensure that your fellow yordles are happy and entertained. Cultivate your green thumb and cook farm-to-table dishes for your guests, or flex your engineering prowess and build gadgets to delight them.

MEET THE CHAMPIONS
Befriend colorful characters and make League of Legends Champions your allies as you unravel the mysteries around you and mend your community, one magical stitch at a time.
70010000069074.intro: Bandle Tale - One little Yordle, one humongous problem.
70010000069074.name: Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story

70010000070142.description:
Jogabilidade única: Controla os teus Quadroids em simultâneo em quatro ecrãs e percorre mais de 100 níveis cheios de perigos. Salta para evitares banhos de ácido, lasers, espigões mortais e outras armadilhas cruéis, ou sacrifica estrategicamente os teus lacaios para criares novas oportunidades de plataformas.

Quadroids é simples de jogar, com apenas 4 botões (um para cada parte do ecrã), mas será que consegues dominar as cordas?

A solo ou com vários jogadores? Pede aos teus amigos para controlarem um ou mais ecrãs se estiveres a ficar preso no teu próprio cérebro...

Os Quadroids vão desfazer o teu neocórtex em pedaços. Mostra que és o chefe e luta para chegares ao topo da tabela de classificação!
70010000070142.intro: QUADROIDS É UM JOGO DE PLATAFORMAS E PUZZLES QUE TE PERMITE CONTROLAR 4 ECRÃS EM SIMULTÂNEO! RESOLVE MAIS DE 100 NÍVEIS!
70010000070142.name: Quadroids

70010000072594.description:
Siga um fantoche de meia pelas entranhas escuras do tempo e aprenda novas receitas. Conheça seus ancestrais mortos há muito tempo. Explore-os para melhorar suas habilidades culinárias. Tire algumas fotos de dinossauros. Aproprie-se do que puder.

Esta é uma aventura experimental movida por uma história. Não espere uma jogabilidade de culinária de última geração. Na maioria das vezes, você assistirá a vídeos, cozinhará algumas refeições simples, tentando lidar com as coisas saindo do controle, e explorará alguns lugares estranhos.
70010000072594.intro: Um curto jogo sobre um viajante do tempo fictício saqueando o passado para roubar receitas.
70010000072594.name: A Time Traveller's Guide To Past Delicacies

70010000073855.description:
Regressa a uma ação mais simples com Froggie - um jogo de plataformas retro de deslocamento lateral apresentado num estilo a preto e branco minimalista. Assume o papel de um sapo antropomórfico e salta através de 100 níveis desafiantes! Corre, salta e desliza em paredes com uma animação pixel art bem fluida! Salta na cabeça dos inimigos, desvia-te de armadilhas com picos e muito mais!

Toca em bandeiras ou atravessa portas para alcançar novos pontos de controlo, caso vás desta para melhor prematuramente. Mas não te preocupes, serás logo recolocado para poderes tentar mais uma vez.

Características:

• Corre, salta, desliza em paredes e muito mais na pele do ágil Froggie!
• Ultrapassa 100 níveis repletos de obstáculos cada vez mais complexos!
• Elimina inimigos ao saltar nas suas cabeças, anda em tapetes rolantes e desvia-te de armadilhas com picos!
• Toca em bandeiras ou passa por portas para alcançar novos pontos de controlo à medida que avanças.
• Sê recolocado e volta a jogar os níveis quantas vezes for preciso!
70010000073855.intro: Salta até à vitória num estilo pixel art bem minimalista!
70010000073855.name: Froggie - A Retro Platformer

70050000045484.description: Bandle Scouts, are always prepared! A wearable Bandle Scout hat for your character, a Bandle Scout hat for your fluffy poro pal, a familiar color for your backpack home, a dazzling pathway effect to light your path, and a new recipe for your cookbook. These items are pre-order exclusives.
70050000045484.name: Bandle Scout Recon Pack

70050000045489.description:
The Bandle Tale: Bigger-On-The-Inside Pack includes:
Poro Closet: Dress up your fluffy little poro pal in two exclusive (and ultra-cute) outfits.
Stand Behind Poro!
Buzzy Poro
Home Sweet Backpack: Two eye-catching exteriors for your bigger-on-the-inside backpack home.
Honeycomb Hive
Purple Prism Bungalow
Strut with Style: Three pathway effects for your character.
Busy Bee

Full Speed Ahead 
Secret Menu: Order up! Fresh out of the oven, three additional recipes to add to your cookbook.
Rainbow Egg
Almost-Perilous Pie
Poro Snax
70050000045489.name: Bandle Tale: Bigger-On-The-Inside Pack

70070000019974.description:
Bandle Tale: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition includes the following:
Poro Closet: Dress up your fluffy little poro pal in two exclusive (and ultra-cute) outfits.
Stand Behind Poro!
Buzzy Poro
